content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron and Copper Smelting Area (Position 0,0 to 4,4)
Consists of three furnaces:
- Furnace 1 at (0,0) - copper smelting
- Furnace 2 at (2,0) - copper smelting  
- Furnace 3 at (4,4) - iron smelting

### Electronic Circuit Production Line (Position 6.5,11.5 to 12.5,11.5)
Automated assembly line consisting of:
- Input chest at (6.5,11.5) storing iron plates and copper cables
- Burner inserter at (7.5,11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at (9.5,11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at (11.5,11.5) moving finished circuits to output chest
- Output chest at (12.5,11.5) storing finished electronic circuits, iron plates and copper plates

### Power Generation System (Position -9.5,24.5 to -2.5,24.5)
Steam power setup with:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5,24.5)
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at (-7.0,24.5)
- Steam engine at (-2.5,24.5)
- Connected electricity poles distributing power

### Science Pack Storage/Lab System (Position 0.5,28.5 to 0.5,31.5)
Science pack handling system with:
- Lab at (0.5,28.5)
- Burner inserter at (0.5,30.5)
- Storage chest at (0.5,31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Inventory Management Errors
- Monitor inventory capacity before harvesting resources - multiple "inventory full" errors occurred
- Keep track of required materials - failed to craft items due to missing ingredients
- Check chest capacity before inserting items - chest overflow errors occurred

### Crafting System Errors
- Ensure required materials are available before attempting to craft
- Monitor material quantities needed for crafting recipes
- Keep track of intermediate products needed for complex recipes

### Resource Extraction Errors
- Check inventory space before attempting to harvest resources
- Maintain fuel levels in burner devices
- Monitor chest contents before attempting to extract items

### Chest Management
- Monitor chest capacities before inserting items
- Verify item presence before attempting extraction
- Balance input/output rates to prevent overflow
